attributes.action: have talks with the Chinese orthorities to stop the live skinning of cats and dogs !
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
99% of People Do Not Realise that
2,000,000 cats and dogs are sadistically skinned alive and fully consius every year in China for their fur and left to die slowly in shock and excruciating pain.And why ? because they say that it is easyer to skin the animal while it is alive (thrashing around in pain and terror !) than to skin a dead animal .SOMETHING HAS TO BE DONE .
Please this has to stop now !

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
